name: Farmer's Market Crop Rush
description:
Originally Made with Scratch for the Scratch Game Jam #2

Theme: Genre Swap

Theme correlation: Peaceful Farming Simulator × Stressful, Fast-Paced Work

Farmer's Market Crop Rush is a fast-paced farming game where customers come up to your stand at the farmer's market, only to realize you grow the crops at the event! You have a limited time to plant and harvest the crops and fulfill the order before the customer gets angry or the crops decay. 

Controls: Mouse/Touchscreen

Click your farmland to plant crops and click the seed boxes to switch which one you plant. Click the crops again to harvest them. To fulfill the order, click the white bubble under the customer. [Quick Tip] Hover over a crop to see a progress bar. 

Credits: 

Music: BGC418 by Big Giant Circles and C418

Sound Effects by Scratch, Gardenscapes, Plants vs. Zombies, and the internet
